nodes.text: Pretts Rulato was a human male criminal who was serving a 50-year sentence on Clak'dor V for manslaughter and industrial negligence. His profile in the New Republic prison registry was one of several that Marshal Carasynthia Dune looked at from her office on the planet Nevarro in around 9 ABY while searching for the profile of prisoner Migs Mayfeld.
Pretts Rulato's profile first appeared in "Chapter 14: The Tragedy", the sixth episode of the second season of The Mandalorian, which was released on December 4, 2020.
